overview: The confessions are more sizzling than ever in this latest episode of forbidden lesbian trysts. Older woman Magdalene St. Michaels rents a room to student Trinity Post - but will Trinity's party-girl antics earn her an eviction, or just a good old-fashioned spanking? Meanwhile, Monique Alexander breaks the rules of her profession and gets a crush on costar Stephanie Swift - will she confess her secret longings, or pretend it's "just business?" Young brunette Georgia Jones has had it with "perfect" roomate Samantha Ryan, even though she secretly fantasizes about the beautiful blonde. Will their argument over Samantha's dress turn anger into lust? And young typist Heather Silk is taking dictation from sexy older redhead Brittany O'Connell. But when the subject matter turns a bit too racy, Heather gets noticeably uncomfortable. Will Heather abandon her job, or just her sexual inhibitions?
title: Lesbian Confessions 3
